header-info: An Attempt at Beautiful Web Design
project-desc: After learning the basics of JavaScript, I decided to create an attractive web design. The first website that came to mind was the Kart Center in Brno Modřice, because I know the owner takes great photos and quality images are the foundation of success. I was also very impressed with the slideshow on the Bowling Brno website. I looked into their source code and found out they were using a jQuery plugin called Vegas. Using this plugin and some beautiful photos, I created the homepage. Since I was learning JavaScript at the time, I also experimented with a few new things I had just learned, such as a dropdown menu, a hiding top bar, and a carousel.
